website_summaries.verdict: A well-made sofa that has a lot to offer. A good choice if you want the look of leather at a mid-range price.
pros: Fabric has a leather look and feel
Stands up to tough wear and tear and easy to wipe clean
cons: The cushions feel a bit soggy and aren't as supportive as other models we considered

customer_reviews.title: This would be a great couch if purchased from a retailer
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great couch if purchased from a retailer, not Amazon. Arrived with a broken frame. Non English speaking or understanding person on the phone was useless. No option to contact Amazon directly with pictures to show useless couch with a broken frame. Looks great, broken and worthless, due to purchasing from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: random name

customer_reviews.title: it looks nice but it's CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: it will not last people... and mine arrived damaged to boot; that's why i started looking at the guts of it. thissofa doesn't have springs but is supported by stretched webbing -- the CHEAPEST sofa you can make or buy. i returned mine and had to fight with AMAZON for my refund. then i went to goodwill and bought a Broyhill 8-way spring tied sofa (that is in much better shape) for only $32, which made me feel i hit the jackpot. please don't buy this hunk of junk... research your furniture and get yourself something decent.
customer_reviews.author: rosa

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived......with a hole...
customer_reviews.text: First off it came from the warehouse with a hole in the front!!! The seating depth is quite narrow, so if you like to sit any other way but upright and straight...forget it. Very stiff and unwelcoming/uncomfortable. Price is too high for this quality sofa, more in the $400 range. I'm expecting Asheley Design to offer me $250 or exchange for the repair of the hole or I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable couch! Easily fall asleep as it's very cushiony
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable couch! Easily fall asleep as it's very cushiony. For the money, you will be hard-pressed to find a better quality and aesthetically-appealing couch. It is very large, so ensure there is enough space width-wise, as well. Especially if you're in a small apartment. But, it's worth every bit of space!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but be forewarned, small butt space!
customer_reviews.text: Couch is good and the leather is nice but because you cannot remove back cushions be prepared to sit straight up. The seat dimensions not available in advertisement do not mention the very short bottom seating area. Not a kick back kind of couch!
customer_reviews.author: M.L. Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: best sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. feels nice. bed is one you can actually use. Price is spot on. no regrets. it has been about one month. kids keep trying to pull out the bed to lay on it to watch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need something that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Ok, first, I doubt anyone is as crazy as I and has 5 big dogs, but... these loveseats (and the sofa) have held up like you would not believe. After a year I have put covers on them only because they are in my family room and the dogs think they belong to them. But one of my dogs thinks she is a mountain goat and sleeps on the back cushion, yes jumps up there and spreads out. The seat cushions are still comfortable and sturdy, the back cushions are great, when I see the actual material, it's still beautiful. I would buy a houseful of these if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Vizsla Mom!

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and comfortable. And a good value for a sleeper sofa.
customer_reviews.author: belinda

customer_reviews.title: Love my loveseat.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought buying furniture online could be so easy. I did go to the local Ashley store and sat on the exact same loveseat to discover if I liked the fabric and its comfort, etc. Then I ordered it online. It was delivered with white glove care. Easy! The back cushions flatten out from leaning back on them, but there is a zipper on the bottom of each back pillow so you can reach in and refluff the stuffing. Plus the two big pillows that come with it work as a back rest too. I was told that at the Ashley store. I don't know if it's listed in the details online.
customer_reviews.author: Ablelady

customer_reviews.title: Larkinhurst Sofa and Loveseat
customer_reviews.text: February 2, 2019: We received the sofa and loveseat today. It is exactly as I expected and extremely comfortable. The delivery team of Expressway Furniture was fantastic! Update August 9 2019: We've had the set 6 months now and still looks the same as the day received. That is with us lounging, and napping on it while binge watching tv daily, it has held up nicely. No complaints yet. Half the price here versus through Ashley Home stores! Oh, try the Nourison rug, I provided the link in the Q&A section...matches the throw pillows. (Rug:
customer_reviews.author: New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Solid and beautiful for the price!
customer_reviews.text: When this sofa went on sale for $525 (cheaper than the accompanying love seat) we decided to order two couches. We were impressed with the quality, sturdiness, and comfort of the couches. We do foster care, animal rescue, have a large family, and have some big people in our family as well. These couches are holding up great and still look brand new after two months. we are very happy with our purchase, and would gladly do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffith

customer_reviews.title: BETTER EXPLANATION OF DELIVERY OF LARGE ITIEMS!
customer_reviews.text: Price was $450 cheaper, plus delivery that actual Ashley Store in my area. The color, quality was exactly what was in the Ashley store. Purchased two loveseats. Both had fabric underlining ripped across the bottom! The two throw pillows were horribly stuffed and not comfortable. Not able to use unless I have them properly stuffed. PROBLEM: EACH TIME THE LOVESEATS WERE DELIVERED I WAS TOLD THEY WOULD BE LEFT BY FRONT DOOR! I am 72 years old, and not able to maneuver or bring them in myself! That was NOT clearly explained to me at the time of placing orders. Otherwise I am extremely happy with my two Ashley loveseats.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne poulos

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED DAMGED !!
customer_reviews.text: The low rating is because I received a damaged one. I Love this sofa!! I had this same one that was worn out after 11 years of use, so after looking at every furniture store and online I decided to buy this Ashley sofa again. It Was Received Damaged either in manufacturing or shipping - the left armrest if sitting on sofa is flimsy, makes noise if any pressure is applied to it, 2 metal things sticking out, and just unacceptable. I refused delivery of this one after I inspected it, I'm sad, and want an undamaged one delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Libbie

customer_reviews.title: Ripped up couch!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with thin plastic all torn, couch torn. Thanksgiving in 12 days, I’m livid
customer_reviews.author: Janis Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Corners of back loveseat cushions aren’t stuffed very well, also Sofa where I sit and I weigh 111 lbs, is flatting
customer_reviews.text: Love the sofa and love seat, but when’s the cane, nobody here at the house to help a guy bring it in and my husband had to help bring it in the living room that I noticed was on the love seat at the top are not fully stuff on corners, I really do love that feels great but I’m happy with the corners on the back cushions with no stuffing. It’s maybe from the packing in the truck. Warranty but I have to notify The company.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Good sofa with best price
customer_reviews.text: It amazing comfortable sofa with best price. Amazon changed the first sofa for us, because it had some defects, looks like it was in show room or was return with defects. And first deliveryman don't want me to help me with transportation. But after that cases AMAZON took all problems for them self and took old sofa and take new sofa very quick without headache. That's why I set up 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best high-end sofa I've ever bought online
customer_reviews.text: The best high-end sofa I've ever bought online! It is so beautiful, well constructed with quality fabrics, frame and accents. Husband had to 'break it in' over the last week even though he's got the matching chair/recliner due to be delivered in a few days (couch is Mine!). Delivered with Prime Free Shipping via a Semi !! I know this beautiful and sturdy piece of furniture will last many, many years ~ even with our grandchildren climbing and playing all over it....feel I need to name this lovely piece. Any suggestions??
customer_reviews.author: kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be nicer! Best sofa we've ever purchased, very high quality. Our local Ashley store had the same one for 50.00 more, no accent pillows, and a delivery charge. This was a great deal and delivery was top notch quality. May but the loveseat as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joni R. Berte

customer_reviews.title: They need to change their packaging to protect it better. The material on the underside was sliced up
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early but was damaged had to reject it I paid for a new item . it should arrive as if it was just manufactured. They need to change their packaging to protect it better. The material on the underside was sliced up . I have ferrets and can not have holes for them to drag stuff into the couch. 550 dollars is a lot of money to me . I would like to get what is avertised. Not ding and dent discount items.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: durable and comfortable. Good for people with pets
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, durable and comfortable. Good for people with pets, dog hair doesn't stick, spots can be wiped clean. Best of all I don't have to keep a cover on the sofa anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but cushion is too hard to sit on for more than a few minutes and back support isn’t right for back comfort. Plus be aware it contains feathers if you are allergic. Also more minor but annoying is cut in fabric where they must finish doing it, right at the corner under seat but it shows. It does not seem sturdy or well made. I’m sending mine back, 2 Sofas at cost of $100 to return ($50 each). Buyer beware! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on Delivery. Other than that, I like it
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable couch. Delivered on time. However, it has several tears in the fabric and the legs are damaged at multiple places. I would like to get an even swap for an undamaged one, but apparently that involves an act of Congress as the replacement process errors out everytime I try to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: nice sofa but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sofa, but it arrived damaged. There was a cut on the left arm. After contacting customer service a new one was sent, but it was damaged worse than the first!!!!This one has a two foot long rip in the back and was stained terribly almost like it was rained on. Instead of dealing with another return, I chose to keep the first.
customer_reviews.author: courtney clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sofa 6/2019 for $529+tax w/free shipping. I like the look, it's comfortable, the cushions are reversible, 2 accent pillows, faux leather on one side and nice printed fabric on the other. The quality is about a 6-7 out of 10, but being single and I don't get a ton of company it fits my needs just fine. I would definitely reconsider if I had kids or pets. I would value this Sofa at between $550 to $600.
customer_reviews.author: Al  H.

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love ❤️ my sofa
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love ❤️ my sofa. Looks beautiful! Feels great! Sits up high, which is what I need. The pillows that came with it are so nice. It looks like leather, but so soft & very rich. I like it better than leather. I want the loveseat now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal compared to stores. Nice sofa!
customer_reviews.text: Saw these in an Ashley store and really liked them, comfortable and nice looking... but not the price, almost $1000 each. Ugh. Found them on Amazon for a steep discount and took a gamble on XPO shipping. We had zero issues, they arrived perfect and we feel like we got a great deal on a nice sofa/loveseat set. People should really know that if they arrive damaged do not sign for them. It's not convenient but you're not too bright if you sign for damaged goods!?
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, attractive, and simple.
customer_reviews.text: I was very worried about buying a couch online that I had not sat in or seen directly with my own eyes. I put my trust in Amazon reviews and I have no regrets. This couch was a huge improvement over my previous one. It is extremely comfortable and I love the way it looks. I think my girlfriend was hoping for something a little more feminine, but I sure wasn't. With free delivery, you can't really go wrong. Although, my delivery was over an hour late in a four hour window that I wasted time away from work for.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: ... this couch several months ago & couldn't be more pleased. It looks beautiful & the mattress is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this couch several months ago & couldn't be more pleased. It looks beautiful & the mattress is very comfortable, which is somewhat surprising for a sleeper sofa. If you're looking for style & comfort, this is the sofa for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations from order to setup.
customer_reviews.text: This loveseat is comfortable, attractive, and just what we wanted. The information about materials, size, and color was right. We love it. Comfortable. It is not too soft - just right for dignified sitting and standing up again! Beautiful soft taupe-brown. There is a policy that you can buy in case there is damage, but it arrived in great condition. The delivery was on time (the delivery service provided helpful updates and contact information). We paid an extra $20 fee to have it delivered and set up in the room we wanted. Quickly done. Great service. Very pleased with the whole process.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace a loveseat that needed a complete rebuild at a much higher price. Not only is this piece of furniture sturdy, solid, and comfortable, the fabric is of good quality, feels good, and easy to clean. The delivery experience was a dream. We had to make changes to the delivery due to family emergency and then weather-- and through it all the delivery company was pleasant, professional, understanding, flexible, and got it done. Great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality. Frame broke within 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch this past summer and the frame is already broken. I do.not have children or pets jumping on the couch. I am very disappointed in this couch. When I first got it I loved it. It was very comfortable and felt like it was a quality piece of furniture. It didn't even last 6 months!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I've had the matching sleeper sofa to this for about three years now and wanted to buy the matching loveseat. This was SEVERAL hundred dollars cheaper than the store I bought the sleeper sofa from, and I already knew I trusted the brand. The cushions are very comfortable, yet still firm enough that you aren't swallowed alive. The microfiber has a leather look to it, but is effortless to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this couch almost 3 months ago. I must say that it’s looks great and fancy, the quality is bad. First of it had damage during the delivery, but Amazon customer service gave us a discount, which was great. We don’t use the couch often, but after almost 3 months now there is a dent in the middle of the couch. The insulation is very poor! The quality is poor! Do not waste your money! It’s not worth it! Btw the pillows that it came with gave my husband a bad allergy reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful Delivery with a few days. Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. Been looking for a loveseat at local stores and online. This is perfect for my space and is just beautiful. Can’t tell you how much this met my expectations cuz it was beyond. Delivery was in 4 days You just screw the legs on and in 5 minutes you are done. Any doubt about purchasing this I will tell you, you can’t go wrong. You will be in Awe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: The sofa itself is very nice and met all our expectations. But it says that the delivery will call to set up an appointment and they didn't call until they were in the area to deliver and they only dropped it off curbside. Also, it had some damage to the back of the sofa when it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice couch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice couch for the money. I was worried making a purchase like this online, but after about a month of living with the couch, I believe I got my moneys worth. I couldn't find anything locally that fit my budget and this couch is comparable to couches that I've seen locally for twice the money. My only two complaints (the first is to be expected) are moving it into the house was a pain and the cushions are a little on the firm side.
customer_reviews.author: B.P.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this couch
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch! I was uncertain of ordering online. I read all the reviews and thought why not. After receiving it, we love it! Comfy, sturdy, and the bed is great too! I have slept on it multiple times with comfort. My kiddo uses it all the time for sleep overs! We couldn't be happier with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tmcpheron

customer_reviews.title: Came damage two time purchased from another vendor
customer_reviews.text: Love the item, I already have two. Love set and hidabed. Ordered sofa for another room. waited about 1 month came damaged waited anothe month came damaged again. Ordered from another vendor. Delivered in good shape. Firm seating, do not feel like you are in a hole , material look like leather but actually material. Would recomend item.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Wow...what a deal on a beautiful sofa. We bought this for our cabin. Delivered and even installed in our home...they even took all the protective coverings. You can fall asleep on this sofa and dream. You'll think it's made of the finest materials as its soft and plush. So happy we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrios

customer_reviews.title: tore on back in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: have had it less than a month, already has a tear. never used bed, mattress is only three inches thick
customer_reviews.author: kacey

customer_reviews.title: Took what seemed like forever for the sofa to arrive and even took ...
customer_reviews.text: Took what seemed like forever for the sofa to arrive and even took several phone calls to make sure it was indeed in transit after being told 3 different arrival dates that had came and went. But, when it finally came I couldn't be happier with it. Very nice quality. Well built for the price you can't beat it. Cushions offer a lot of comfort and support. And the best part was I didn't have to deal with any annoying salesmen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice furniture at a good price
customer_reviews.text: If this is your style, this is a good buy. Seems durable, and the fabric is both soft and strong. Releases dirt and pet hair well. Mine was a little darker than the pic, but works. Do wish the rear pillows were removable, as they are sewn on, but will survive. Plus, made in USA!
customer_reviews.author: C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Nice sofa bed - well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made (note - pretty heavy). Nice "fabric". I think this will be very durable. Sleeper bed is comfortable but will likely buy a topper for the mattress. One thing to note, the couch "sits high", meaning that the couch is a few inches taller than a "normal" couch. Not a big drawback but something I was not expecting. May tend to be uncomfortable for shorter people. Would recommend however. It has been used both my sons and they have given it a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great couch
customer_reviews.text: Great couch very firm seat. Looks very well made and the pullout is comfortable. I am 250 pounds 6'4" and I fell asleep on it. Delivery with XPO was great they sent out 2 drivers and placed it where we wanted. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: WE had some problems with it but Amazon took care of it. I'm happy with the purchase. A word of caution when you tip it up to put legs on the bottom ; make sure the bed doesn't flop out towards you and injure you like it did my leg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy furniture from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy furniture from Amazon! Our couch looked great but the first time 3 people sat on it there was a loud crack and it sagged in the middle. Amazon “can’t do anything about it since it has been 30 days.” Go to a furniture store it is not worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, and we love the color and feel of the couches. They are relatively comfortable with the springs in the cushions. However, after a year or so, they have begun to creak when we sit in them. One of them we purchased was broken initially and had to be replaced. I don't anticipate them to to last for a long time, but we'll enjoy them while they last.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful loveseat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago and it is holding up beautifully. Easy wipe off exterior ( we have a German shepherd) and looks just as it did when it came out of the box...which was easy assembly. I love this...!
customer_reviews.author: P mcnutt

customer_reviews.title: A very nice sofa and an amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a daily deal and feel that it is well worth what I paid. Even at the regular price I feel it's a good value. The cushions are quite firm, but it is very comfortable to either sit or lay down on. I'm not sure why some feel it is uncomfortable. I like the fact that I don't "sink" in to the point that it's hard to get out. While it's clearly not leather, the feel of the material is very nice. The pillows that come with it are also very nice, and are quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: KevinB

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sofa but delivered with multiple holes
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, buttery soft leather. Super comfortable and classic style. The delivery was terrible. They were supposed to deliver to “room of choice.” They barely got it into the foyer before they left. They kept insisting they were also supposed to pick something up. No idea what that was about. The sofa had only two sides to the box and then it was in shrink wrap. The box or plastic was not damaged, but there are three holes (one is prominent) in the back. Very disappointing. So now I have to take time off again for pick up of the damaged one and delivery of a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good rustic sleeper sofa
customer_reviews.text: Good sleeper sofa. Like the style and feel of it. The sleeper mattress is comfortable for few nights of sleeping, but not for too many consecutive nights. So it's perfect for guests. UPDATE: After three years, the couch is still good in terms of look, feel, seat firmness and comfort. However, the seams on one side of the wooden frame upholstery started coming apart, so I had to stitch it back up before more of it came apart.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic about this bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I love this couch! The delivery went smoothly and the couch is everything I hoped for. This is excellent quality, comfortable and affordable. It came well-wrapped and secured to a large pallet. I'm glad I bought this couch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Berry

customer_reviews.title: First time purchasing couch online
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing a big item like this from AMZ but overall the experience was good. The couches themselves look great and our comfortable. I sit higher then expected but thats not much of an issue. My one gripe is the separate seat cushions tend to come out from under me a little while sitting not a huge issue. Delivery went well however the shipping company didnt have my phone number which Amazon should have given to them for delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kaveman

customer_reviews.title: This couch is poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: The couch is a duplicate of one we bought at a local store. We got one from Amazon and it was defective ( broken arm) It was returned for a new one. The return is built so poorly that all of the stuffing in the arm rests has fallen down inside and the arm rests feel like two pieces of wood. Do not buy from Amazon, the quality of large items do not appear to be the same as purchased from local stores.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: I love it in my house
customer_reviews.text: I love it in my house. It's looks beautiful and it fits the look I was going for 💕. The pillows are feather pillows, which make it more beautiful. And it is comfortable to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Good couch, not so good bed
customer_reviews.text: The couch component is great. Super comfy and comfortable to lie on. Looks great and has a nice material feel so I am very happy with it. It loses a star on the pull out component though. It isn't quite Queen sized and the mattress it comes with isn't very good at all. I suggest if you want anyone to sleep on it that you buy a foam topper or something similar to allow for some more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seat cushion but support is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for aesthetics only. Made in Vietnam. Comfortable seat cushion but support is lacking; to lay on this sofa is to roll into it's center. Never again will I buy furniture I haven't tried out myself. In this case, I wouldn't waste money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Bird

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I brought this a while ago but I needed time to properly submit a review. It is still beautiful the construction is excellent. It is not cheap quality. The mattress is still new and it has been used daily since I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Lady Law

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I waited about a month before writing this review. I nervously bought this couch on Amazon on Black Friday after readily ALL of the reviews. I was nervous about the delivery. I was nervous about the quality. I love this couch! The color, style, and quality are perfect. Delivery was no problem. They came in, squished it through the door carefully (it is poofy), unwrapped it, put the feet on, and put it in place- all in about 15 minutes. They even took the trash with them. It is comfortable and seems like the material will hold up well. This is in our living room which was not used a lot until the couch came.
customer_reviews.author: robin clark

customer_reviews.title: This couch is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the couch is really well built. It is comfortable to sit on and it is easy to move if you need to move it from one space to another. I don't like the 2 big pillows that come with it. they are really bigger then I thought they were but they are really nice. It is really reasonable the price is good for it being a Ashley brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lady K

customer_reviews.title: My perfect solution....
customer_reviews.text: Got this couch bc of dog fur problem. Now my problems are sovled. Looks like worn leather and fur quickly brushes off! Owned for couple weeks and thinking of getting another.
customer_reviews.author: holly roberts

customer_reviews.title: Super solid and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super solid and comfy, it has become a centerpiece of our lives. The fold-out sofa is 6', so if you're 6'1", your feet will hang off the end an inch, but otherwise comfortable. It arrived with the lower-right hand particle wood support damaged and I'll have to add some further support -- I didn't want to mess with returns on this, though -- it's just too big and comfortable to be apart from.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Great couch!
customer_reviews.text: Was SO nervous about getting a couch from Amazon! I shouldn't have been. Looked just like the picture. For perfectly and had no flaws. I paid the extra $20 to have it taken to a downstairs room. They were totally polite and professional. Couldn't have been more satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: terri l azevedo

customer_reviews.title: It fits our need!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in our large living room. We also bought the love seat. It's sturdy and I like that the cushions sit higher than our old one did and that they are plump. Maybe a bit too plump but I'm sure that will change in time. Pillows are not real comfortable but they look nice and we use them. Have no regrets so far. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Sofa
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good quality. One of my kitties threw up on it...I wiped it immediately with a damp cloth (not real wet) and you can't even tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new sofa. It looks and feels like leather and is very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our choice
customer_reviews.text: When we moved we recognized that our favorite but old living room furniture had lived a good life, but it was time to retire it. I did some research and found this couch which apparently met all of our needs and wants. We visited a local brick & mortar store to confirm my result and get my wife on board. It has been everything we expected. Looks great and is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SierraBob

customer_reviews.title: The cushions are very firm and take a bit to get use to
customer_reviews.text: This love seat is perfect for me. Right size beautiful color comfortable and easy to care for fabric. Seems to be well made. Arrived exactly on time as promised and because I paid for it to be it was delivered to the room I wanted in, unpackaged and set up. It is lovely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ashley larkinhurst earth love seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very soft comfortable love seat,the color is different than shown,but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: bjhorn

customer_reviews.title: This sofa is extremely comfortable. I've been using this for over 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant on buying a couch online but the reviews for this product convinced me to give it a try. This sofa is extremely comfortable. I've been using this for over 3 months and the cushions are still very tight and fluffy. I don't experience any sink yet. The color is so neutral and goes with most of my furniture. It is also comfortable to sleep in. The only little concern I have is with the decorative pillows that come with it. These pillows are larger than other decorative pillows and are not really soft. It doesn't bother me so much but if you are planning to take a nap on the couch, better get your bed pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Sravya

customer_reviews.title: It's been a few months and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to write a review so I can actually use the sofa. It's very comfy and soft. Our family is enjoying it with no issues. 5 stars to the delivery people. It was not easy getting it in my door and they made it happen. Give them a raise please. Also, tip them when they come to your door. It's a nice gesture.
customer_reviews.author: ConstantAmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome couches
customer_reviews.text: We received our couch right on time. The two gentleman who deleviered it to us called to scheduled a time when they would arrived. They were kind enough to bring it upstairs and help assemble it for us. They provided excellent service. And our furinituew came exactly how the picture came out. No damage to our couches it was all intact and beautiful. Def would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The leather is soft and smooth. The pillows are reversible. It was delivered a week early. The round legs was easy to put on. The only thing is the curbside delivery. They should just do away with the curbside delivery and add a delivery charge. So far very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: smooth

customer_reviews.title: Less than Expected, But Still Worth It
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice couch don't get me wrong, but there are a few things I am disappointed in. The fabric feels and looks like the "leather look" is just printed on it. The top cushions are not filled all the way, so there is a empty spot on all of them, and just doesn't feel full enough. All in all the couch was worth it even though it's not perfect it is still a very comfortable couch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Came in perfect condition on the scheduled delivery date. I love that the toss pillows are feather pillows that are easily removed. I took my pillow covers off and am now using fall pillow covers .
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Great loveseat. Well padded and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Firm seat cushions. Softer back cushions. Feels sturdy. Good material in the “distressed” look. Arrived in perfect condition, well wrapped/padded/packaged. Delivery men were great!
customer_reviews.author: Bartlet

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Coming from older expensive leather couches I was worried this might let me down. I couldn't afford real leather again so this looked like a good option. Great bang for your buck. Looks much more expensive. Feels great. Delivered on time with no damage from a local retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Although I was leery to order this online but must say I love this sofa and I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received today. After shopping around in stores and testing many sofas , I decided to take a chance on ordering this sofa. . Although I was leery to order this online but must say I love this sofa and I'm very happy with this purchase. I would highly recommend this and would say don't worry about ordering this online . If this is your style than go for it. Looks like leather but material so soft, no fake pleather feel. Delivery was on time with no issues. Again I would recommend without hesitation. Great style, feel and price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Roger Lees

customer_reviews.title: Good couch, great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good couch at a great price. It holds up well to a 70 pound dog and is easy to clean. It is very comfortable as well. You don't have to have a pillow behind your back to sit comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: LastFreeMan

customer_reviews.title: you will love this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these a year ago and I love them! They look great, are comfortable, and I lovevthe seat height!! I was so tired of sofas that sit so low. Great sofa and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nanasopinion

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and dog friendly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great love seat.. Sits nice.. and the cushions are reversible.. so happy with the purchase. However they do not deliver in home. I talked the driver into putting in garage til i could get some help.
customer_reviews.author: tlr8259

customer_reviews.title: The bed is comfortable. The color was is a tad darker than ...
customer_reviews.text: The cushions are a bit stiff, but assume will soften some over time. The bed is comfortable. The color was is a tad darker than I thought it would be but it blends in with the other couch I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Hanna

customer_reviews.title: The couch I've always wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Seriously. I think this may be the best thing I've ever bought from Amazon, definitely the best couch I've ever owned. Beautiful, soft where it needs to be, firm where it needs to be. Tall couch, beautiful pillows, all around score!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Deetz

customer_reviews.title: Well-worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this order! The shipping and handling crew was great. They were very professional and courteous while I opened the packaging to examine the couch. The couch itself is exactly as pictured. It is firm to sit in, as I wanted it to be. I am 5'5" and my feet do not lay flat on the floor when I am sitting all the way back in the couch. Very mild "manufacturing" scent. I'm looking forward to enjoying this couch for years!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice enough but cannot get it to fit in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice enough but cannot get it to fit in my upstairs apartment. Contacted the seller about possible returns and he said it might be a 20% charged. Therefore, if you are in New Jersey and looking this couch to buy I have it brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Sachette

customer_reviews.title: Best deal we've came across in years.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no disappointment here. This is a most beautiful and comfortable sofa ever. And the price and delivery was remarkable. We love it and are now thinking possibly of a matching love seat. But will have to wait 'till the Holiday season is past first. Easy to clean, and the pillows are fantastic. Thank you so much. We are 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Young

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: The couch was delivered when they said it would be. The couch itself looks great and is comfortable. I gave it 4 stars because the back cushion on one side is 'puffed' out a bit which lowers the top of the cushion making the top of the 3 cushions look slightly unbalanced.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Got here sooner than I thought and I love the fabric and the structure. Just arrived and unpacked. Super happy. Thank you DiVani!
customer_reviews.author: M. Askew

customer_reviews.title: Horrible love seat and sofa
customer_reviews.text: Arm came broken Sent in review and emailed company Never got any reply Stickers on cushions Glue never came off Sofa squeezes Still squeezes after a year Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Sleeper sofa
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with delivery. We love the color and quality. We haven't slept on the mattress yet so until we do will not give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The original sofa I ordered was delivered extremely damaged - a board on the bottom front was broken in half and I deduce it was done by a forklift. I rejected it on the spot. The second one came in perfect condition. I have had it for a few months now and am extremely happy with it. All six of my kids play on it and it looks just as new as the day I bought it. Kudos to Amazon for making it right immediately.
customer_reviews.author: John Pronti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sofa and excellent delivery
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sofa at a great price! Delivery was right on time. Sofa was wrapped really well. I was concerned about damage since it shipped from California (I live in Florida), but it arrived in perfect condition. It’s very firm and comfortable. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Hobby

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: This couch would have lasted a few more years but due to poor craftsmanship it is ruined. There were staples sticking out that cut through the middle cushion. Also sliced my finger when I felt it to see what was going on. Poor quality control and workmanship. I do not recommend Ashley.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The delivery people were efficient and pleasant. Loveseat is as I expected. Would buy again. Would have been 5 stars except arms of loveseat are not as well padded as the rest of the loveseat.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Loveseat
customer_reviews.text: This loveseat is so nice! It looks very expensive and really compliments the room. It is well built and very comfortable. Fits two people with plenty of room. Well worth every penny plus it gets delivered right to your door.
customer_reviews.author: KrisTina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, low price.
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is sturdy and comfortable. The picture doesn't do it justice. It is a very attractive piece of furniture and looks like it will last for years and years. It is easily cleaned...I have a house dog that sheds quite excessively and it brushes right off. I would highly recommend this sofa for it's quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: cherbear67

customer_reviews.title: Super quality couch
customer_reviews.text: This couch is the bomb. Due to a mix up in delivery I had to wait longer .....Wow am I glad I did. Perfectly comfortable...looks like real worn leather. Like all my other Ashley products...Top Notch. Caught on to their fine decor on Amazon and furnished my entire home Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: rim country woman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Looks like leather but it isn't. Mine arrived with chemical smell instead of leather smell so I left it air out on the patio first
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking couch
customer_reviews.text: Could not get into my upstairs apartment. I’m still waiting for the refund.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Busted furniture during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The couch is comfortable, but it was damaged in shipping. Torn in 3 places, waa dropped and arm wood was broken, so the nailheads were not screwed in the wood and wood in back was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bowling Miller

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley - Larkinhurst Contemporary Faux Leather Sofa w/ Nailhead Trim, Earth
product_meta.description: Color:Earth| Style:SofaDramatically transform your living space with the rustic look of weathered leather you love—at a fraction of the cost. That’s the beauty of the Larkin Hurst faux leather sofa. Washed in earthy Southwestern tones, with generous back and seating support and jumbo window-pane stitching, it envelops you in comfort and quality. Classic elements such as rolled arms and turned feet bring in just enough traditional touch. Fabric: Body and One Side Toss Pillows: POLYESTER (95 %) PU (5 %)|Oneside Toss Pillows: POLYESTER (100 %)
feature_bullets: TRADITIONAL SOFA: Rich texture and quality comfort meet in this sofa. The stylish rolled arms give it a traditional touch, while the weathered faux leather make it easy on the eyes
PLUSH UPHOLSTERY: This sofa is made with a polyester/polyurethane blend. Includes 2 decorative pillows made of polyester/polyurethane and polyester
EARTHY TONE: There's something so relaxing about the neutral tone. With nailhead trim accents and generous back seating support, you can lounge fashionably into the cozy cushions
GREAT LIVING ROOM PIECE: Set this couch with a sleeper or chair for a well-rounded space your guests will love. Measures 89” W x 39” D x 38” H
ARRIVES ASSEMBLED: Ready for instant enjoyment in your home. Fits through doorways 32" or wider
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars500 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
